entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text:
@realDonaldTrump On this Memorial day, #WeRemember the 1.3+ million Americans who died for their country.

Or as Trumpers would put it: "not a big deal since 1.3 million is less than 1% of our population and they were more likely to die anyway being in the military." #MemorialDay2020 #coronavirus
